pr_title: Standardize the logging message format in ClusterAccessor and ConfigAccessor

timeline.message: Standardize the logging message format in ClusterAccessor and ConfigAccessor

timeline.bodyText:
Thanks for doing this!

Does this include the new endpoints?
LOG is the convention we use throughout our codebase. Could you also quickly change logger's to LOG?
timeline.author: narendly

replies.bodyText:
For your questions:

The new endpoints will be changed in the other PR. This one will be merged before that one.
Updated to LOG.
replies.author: mgao0

timeline.message: Change logging variable name in ClusterAccessor
